title: 46: How To Train Focus & Flow with Steven Kotler
description:
Focus is essential. Every leader of industry and high-performer understands and utilizes focus to achieve massive results. On this episode we have Steven Kotler to give us his best hacks to improve your focus and flow. 

 

Join our growing community here: www.kwikbrain.com
